column5: Our 4 bedroom, 4 bath hill country lake house retreat, is on Lake Marble Falls. Completely secluded 3 acre property with 200 feet lakefront access. Property outdoors includes a pool, hot tub, cabana, living and grilling area, workout area, shower area and hanging king-size bed. Indoor amenities include state of the art TVs and surround sound systems, coffee maker (all basic appliances), margarita machine, popcorn machine, \
